Recruitment assistance

 

Energize your teams

We recruit the right talents for you


 


F

or your account, we look for experimented candidates and improve their know-how. A training of 2 months is provided in our offices before they join your teams. The training is followed by a validation of prior learning.

T

his system makes it possible to insure 400 hours of training. The job-seeker who has a scientific and technical background (MASTER DEGREE, engineering,doctorate) can access to advanced technologies during those 2 months before he takes up the job offered by the employer as Java JEE development engineer.
